tool_description: Extracts and analyzes social media profiles for prospects to gather insights about their professional background, interests, and activity patterns.

person_name.description: Full name of the person to search

company_name.description: Company name to help identify the correct person

platforms.description: Social platforms to search: linkedin, twitter, facebook, instagram

extract_posts.description: Whether to extract recent posts and activity

post_limit.description: Maximum number of recent posts to extract

error_messages: Person not found: No social media profiles found for the specified person
Invalid platform: Supported platforms are linkedin, twitter, facebook, instagram
Company mismatch: Person found but not associated with the specified company
Profile access restricted: Some profiles are private and cannot be accessed
Invalid post limit: post_limit must be between 1 and 50
usage: Provide the person's name and optionally their company to find their social media profiles. Specify which platforms to search and whether to extract recent posts.

profiles_found.description: List of social media platform names where profiles were found

profile_urls.description: URLs of found social media profiles
